title: Enderun Hospitality Management selects LIVE by eRevMax
text:
Enderun Hospitality Management selects LIVE by eRevMax Published on : Wednesday, July 22, 2015
Enderun Hospitality Management (EHM), an emerging hospitality management solutions provider, has selected LIVE by eRevMax to assist in online distribution for its member hotels. Seven properties from the group will be using the LIVE platform for channel management as well as booking engine capabilities. LIVE is a web-based platform that offers detailed competitor intelligence, comprehensive business performance analytics and reliable channel management functionality from a single sign-on dashboard.
Philippine-based Enderun Hospitality Management primarily engages with local independent hotels and restaurant owners and actively assists them in their business operations, sales, marketing and revenue management. Most hotels under the group will be using the newly launched RateTiger LIVE platform to benefit from real-time rate and inventory update across channels ensuring online sales optimization and expansion.
“Enderun Hospitality Management has been growing rapidly over the last few years with diverse clients, from city-centre hotels to luxury resorts. Using RateTiger LIVE allows our team to save time in managing multiple online distribution channels, and to focus on important business decisions,” said Bobby Horrigan, Managing Director of Enderun Hospitality Management.
“We are happy to announce our partnership with Enderun Hospitality Management. It highlights the success of our innovative technologies that are positively impacting business performance and distribution processes for hotels across geographies. With online bookings growing exponentially in the region, it is important for hotels to leverage all distribution platforms effectively for increased online revenue,” said Christine Toh, Sales Director for APAC at eRevMax.
LIVE by eRevMax, powered with sophisticated analytics, reliable distribution capabilities and interactive reporting dashboard, help hotels make informed decisions based on key insights and streamline all aspects of revenue management for driving better results.
